name: Hotrau
description:
Created as a third year Professional Project at  Abertay University in 2020/2021.

Hotaru is a charming narrative exploration game that follows the player in their quest to find the cause of the spreading darkness from the forest. Along their journey they will be joined by an enigmatic narrator as they set out to find the key to bringing balance to the forest: the fireflies. The player will run, jump and collect fireflies through beautiful setpieces and gorgeous atmosphere in this casual, relaxing game.

Running Hotaru:

Unzip the submission folder, or open it and extract the folder \Hotaru Build\ from the zipped folder.

In the extracted folder, navigate to \Hotaru Build\WindowsNoEditor and run Hotaru.exe.

From there, you can navigate the menus with your mouse to start the game.
